profiles.name: Enrique Montes
profiles.summary: Strapi developer expert in API development, custom plugins, migrations from WordPress/Contentful. Integrate Strapi with Next.js and automate workflows with n8n. Full-stack developer with 7 years experience building fast, scalable web applications. Focus on performance (SSR, SSG, ISR), SEO, clean architecture, CI/CD, Docker, AWS/Vercel. Results: 60% faster load times, 50% less content management time, 70% fewer manual tasks. Services: Full-stack development (Strapi + Next.js), CMS migrations, performance optimization, workflow automation, API development, DevOps. Tech stack: Strapi, Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, n8n, Docker, AWS, Vercel, Netlify.

portfolio.title: Real Estate Lead Distribution System with N8n & Custom Dashboard
portfolio.description: Developed an automated lead distribution system for a real estate company integrating Sierra CRM, Follow Up Boss, and Slack. Built N8n workflows that capture leads via webhooks, enrich data from multiple APIs, and enable real-time agent claiming through Slack. Created a Next.js/Supabase admin dashboard for configuring distribution rules, custom messages, claim quotas, and agent management. System includes cooldown periods, credit restoration, and comprehensive analytics to optimize lead response times and agent performance.

portfolio.title: Industrial Crane Platform: Next.js Frontend with Strapi Headless CMS
portfolio.description: Built an industrial crane sales and rental platform using Next.js and Strapi headless CMS. Architected the complete Strapi backend with custom content types, API endpoints, and dual inventory management for sales and rental operations. Led the Next.js implementation, establishing project structure, TypeScript configuration, and API integration layer. Developed business logic for equipment tracking, availability management, and real-time inventory synchronization. Delivered a performant, type-safe full-stack solution optimized for industrial equipment management and seamless content delivery.

portfolio.title: Temporary Email Service: React Frontend & Nginx/Dovecot Backend
portfolio.description: Developed a temporary email service allowing users to generate disposable email addresses valid for 30 minutes. Designed a responsive React frontend for seamless user interaction. Engineered the backend using Nginx on DigitalOcean, integrating Dovecot for email storage and Postfix for message delivery. Utilized Supabase to manage and store temporary emails and messages, ensuring scalability and reliability. The project emphasized security, efficiency, and user experience, providing a practical solution for short-term email needs.

portfolio.title: Peters - App Optimization

portfolio.title: Bridge Artists - Website Maintenance
portfolio.description: Fixed Gatsby/Contentful errors on Netlify, performed site development, maintenance, and data modeling.
